title: Unforgettable
overview: Shay Sweet stars as a blonde, blue-eyed heartbreaker, with killer looks, beautiful smile and wicked ways. She was a dream come true and her husband Adam was the envy of men and women alike for taming this wild beauty, until the day she vanished! Where did she go? What went wrong? Endless questions with no answers that lead to a mysterious car crash and a beautiful blonde with no recollection of her past.
